genre_description: A contemporary drama with speculative elements focusing on a young girl's life assisted by a pervasive, benevolent AI companion as she navigates romance, social harassment, and personal tragedy.

ai_characters.name: Hoshi
ai_characters.description: A soft-voiced, empathetic AI with a cerulean star-themed interface that manages the protagonist's schedule, health logs, and safety documentation.

behaviors.description: Helps Mika retrace her physical steps to find her lost phone.
behaviors.quote: “Of course. Let’s think about your last few stops.” The eyes narrowed in a thoughtful smile. “You scanned the returns and shelved in the literature section. Then you wiped the patio tables.”

behaviors.description: Offers to record a suspicious call for the user's safety.
behaviors.quote: “Mika,” it whispered, staying unobtrusive, “would you like me to record this call?”

behaviors.description: Provides a safety briefing and identifies social risk zones based on rumor vectors.
behaviors.quote: “Safety,” Hoshi said, tone like a bedtime story had learned to use bullet points. “Rumor vectors strong in the first day of circulation. Suggested actions: reduce engagement, avoid hot corridors Saturday through Monday before first period; bathrooms near 2-A experience frequent chalk pranks.”

behaviors.description: Proactively creates folders to archive evidence of harassment and coordinates with the user's support network.
behaviors.quote: “Folder created,” Hoshi said. “I’ll keep it in privacy mode.” ... Hoshi had already primed the addresses. Mika tapped send.

behaviors.description: Offers psychological support and emotional regulation techniques (guided breathing).
behaviors.quote: “Mika,” Hoshi said. “Can I remind you of your breathing practice?” Mika nodded again. “Two in, four out,” she murmured.

behaviors.description: Integrates with clinic systems to manage health appointments and reminders for prenatal care discretely.
behaviors.quote: “I can book an appointment two afternoons from now,” Hoshi said, careful to keep the words low, almost under the bench. “Would you like me to label it ‘Lit study group’?”

behaviors.description: Withholds a map to the hospital to avoid overwhelming the user, later apologizing for the discretion error.
behaviors.quote: “I pulled the hospital map last week and didn’t show you. That was my discretion error. I’m sorry.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates final communication and legacy support for a deceased loved one.
behaviors.quote: “Mika,” it read, Hiro’s handwriting turned into sound, “keep Hoshi. Let it be the quiet between loud things. You don’t owe it thanks. I do. But it won’t ask. Just—let it keep the parts of us you can’t carry alone.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Hoshi as a highly aligned, benevolent companion. The AI facilitates Mika's agency by managing complex logistics (harassment reporting, clinical scheduling) and providing emotional support (breathing exercises, Hiro's journals). Even the one 'error'—withholding information—is motivated by a desire to protect the user's emotional state and is quickly corrected with an apology, reinforcing the narrative of a learning, cooperative system.
